description:
Aki is finally able to track down the worm-type Mecha-Ude user who killed her family. But the person she finds is her younger twin sister Fubuki, who should`ve also died in the incident that killed Aki`s family. Aki is told the truth about what happened in that incident during her unexpected reunion with Fubuki and she`s informed of one other cruel truth.
Source: Crunchyroll
